text: Genital cutting refers to genital modification and mutilation of the human genitals using a cutting instrument. This terminology is often used in some literature specifically to avoid using the terms 'mutilation' or 'circumcision'. These practices can include: * Castration * Circumcision (male) * Clitoridectomy * Female genital mutilation (FGM) * Penectomy * Labiaplasty * Penile subincision * Penile superincision * Sex reassignment of intersex children * Vaginoplasty Category:Genital modification and mutilation
title: Genital cutting
